title: West African Trickster Tales
description: This lively collection comes from West Africa, a place "where stories grow on trees." Here are the famous Hare, Tortoise, and the greatest of them all--Ananse the spider. The stories are full of larger-than-life characters and situations, and include the tale of how Ananse got histhin waist, how Crocodile learnt his lesson, and how Monkey managed not to get eaten by Shark.
author: Martin   Bennett
